name: Green Orbit Academy
description: A platform offering workshops and online courses on sustainable marketing for space organisations.

name: Space for Neurodiversity
description: Space for Neurodiversity is a supportive initiative dedicated to creating inclusive environments for neurodivergent individuals in education, work, and community. We provide resources, advocacy, and collaborative opportunities to celebrate diverse ways of thinking and enable everyone to thrive.

name: Space Impact Forum
description: An online forum for discussion, collaboration, and networking in the space industry.

name: Leicester Space Week
description: Annual event celebrating space innovation and community engagement in Leicester.

name: Space Integrity Initiative
description: Promoting responsible and sustainable practices in space operations worldwide.

name: The Sustainable Space Podcast
description: A podcast exploring the intersection of space innovation and environmental responsibility.
